alert.note: Alert for Barber; Comanche (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 6:23PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Barber and eastern Comanche Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 622 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Aetna, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lake City around 635 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Medicine Lodge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
